lines.text: You know, Mrs. Barlow, there's something I'd like straighten out.
What's that, Matt?
Well, I did a lot of things around here I'm kind of ashamed of. I tore up your lawn with my '40 Ford...
Many times.
Took my pants off in front of your friends...
Oh, yes.
And I even passed out in your closet, but I never, and I don't know who could have if I didn't, but I never, and I repeat never, ever pissed in your steam iron.
Mexico! Surfboards! Guns!
[Waxer pretends to be homosexual to avoid being drafted]
Are you a homosexual?
Yes." Yes.

Well, you're just gonna love it in the United States Army. There's lots of men there. And they get real close in foxholes and tanks, and in combat. Get him out of here and process him in the Marine Corps.
If you send me to Vietnam, I'll just die.
[Leroy the Masochist pretends to be insane to avoid being drafted]
I see here they call you a masochist.
I like pain.
Can you be specific? What kind of pain do you like?
Any kind of pain.
Such as?

I like fights, I've dove through windows, I've eaten light bulbs, I like sharks, any kind of blood. If you gave me a gun, I'd shoot you in the face just to see what it looked like when the bullet hit.

I don't wanna be a star. Have my picture in magazines, have a bunch of kids looking up to me. I'm a drunk, Bear, a screw up. I just surf cause its good to go out and ride with your friends. I don't even have that anymore.
That's the lemon next to the pie.
Hey, do you surf, man? Are you a surfer?
Oh, no... Not me, I'm just a garbage man.
More beer!
You've got a great figure.
Thank you. You too.
Is that a padded bra?
No, this is all me.
God.
You should try a padded bra.
I have one on.
Why don't you get back to Burbank!
He ain't no hodad Squidlips!
Stay casual, Barlow.
Will you delinquents shut up? Someday you'll have to straighten out and earn a decent living. Pay attention and grow up sometime. Turn into a respectable person.
He's a well-respected surfer.
That's not a sport, it's a disease.
